DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the continued effectiveness and safety of Cat-PAD in cat allergic subjects for up to five years after the start of administration of treatment. The study is an optional follow-up study to a phase III double-blind, placebo controlled, Cat-PAD study; no further investigational product is administered.
DOC.criteria: previously completed clinical study CP007 [NCT01620762] started allergen therapy since completing CP007 Institutionalised due to a legal or regulatory order
